featured.text: Bekoji’s legend Derartu Tulu, who won the 10,000-meter Olympic gold medals in 1992 and 2000, is a national hero.
Nine proposals were submitted, and the Irish-born architect James Hoban won the gold medal for his practical and handsome design.
Over 6,000 people have received the Carnegie Medal.
The medal was named after Andrew Carnegie.

other.text: The Carnegie Medal is given to those who are (A) sick and poor.
One such reward is the Carnegie Medal.
Michael Phelps, an American swimmer, broke seven world records and won eight gold medals in men’s swimming _____ in the 2008 Olympics.
If so, they receive money as well as the Carnegie Medal.

definition.zh_def: 獎牌，通常用於表彰成就或勝利的金屬片。
definition.en_def: A metal disc or piece awarded as a prize or honor for achievement or victory.
definition.example: She won a gold medal in the Olympic Games.
